pressed.$description: Use it for interactive inner surfaces, such as the chip close button in its pressed state. Light mode: pec-gray-16 at 20%. Dark mode: pec-white at 20%.

hover.$description: Use it for hovered states on neutral or colored surfaces, when subtler emphasis is needed through opacity (light lime-64 at 20%, dark: lime-60 at 20%) without changing the underlying color meaning.
